app.themingtitle: Set the style for your course
app.choosethemedesc:
Select the base theme for your course and apply any saved 'preset' styles using the two dropdowns below.

IMPORTANT: Changing the options here will replace any unsaved selections you've made in the form below; make sure there's nothing you want to keep!
app.themepresettip: Tip: You can save your selections below as a 'preset' for quick access later. Do this using the button in the sidebar.
app.themenoteditablebody: Your currently selected theme is not editable.
app.themeselecterror: You need to select a theme!
app.restorepresettext: This will discard the selected settings and restore the defaults for your chosen theme and preset combination.
app.themeoverwrite: By continuing, you will overwrite the saved settings for the %{preset} preset
app.presetinputtext: Enter a name for the new preset
app.duplicatepreseterror: A preset with that name already exists.
app.preseteditdesc: You can view, change name and delete the saved presets for the chosen theme here.
app.presetdeletetext:
This will delete the saved '%{preset}' preset.

IMPORTANT: This will affect any existing courses using this preset.
app.name: Name
app.alreadyloggedin: Looks like you are already logged in! Click the button below to go to your dashboard.
app.confirmdeleteusertransfer: Ownership of this user’s courses will be transferred to you.
app.confirmdeleteuserdelete:
All of this user’s unshared courses will be deleted.

Ownership of their shared courses will be transferred to you.
app.confirmdeleteusershare: All of this user’s courses will be shared and ownership will be transferred to you.
app.confirmsendreset:
Send a password reset email to
%{email}?
app.changeadminaccounts: Please log in as another admin for full access.
app.duplicateuservalueerror: Couldn't save user data. A user already exists with %{key}: %{value}
app.confirmduplicate: Are you sure you want to duplicate this course so you can edit it locally?
app.pleaseaddfile: Please choose a file to upload
app.resetpasswordsuccess: You password has been changed successfully. Click the button below to return to the login screen.
app.resetpassworderror: Your password could not be changed
app.passwordtip: Enter a new password below. The most secure passwords have a mix of numbers, letters (including capitals) and other characters.
app.forgotpasswordblurb: Enter the email address associated with your Adapt account, then click Continue.
app.forgotpasswordfooter: Contact Support for help with restoring access to your account.
app.forgotpasswordsuccess: Your request is being processed. If the details you provided match our records, you will receive further instructions via email.
app.confirmdelete: Are you sure you want to remove this?
app.confirmdeleteproject: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
app.confirmdeleteprojectwarning: IMPORTANT: This will delete all the content in the project
app.confirmdeletesharedprojectwarning: IMPORTANT: This is a shared project and will affect all users of the system.
app.confirmdeletepage: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
app.confirmdeletemenu: Are you sure you want to delete this section?
app.confirmdeletewarningpage: IMPORTANT: You will lose all the contents of this page
app.confirmdeletewarningmenu: IMPORTANT: You will lose all the contents of this section
app.confirmdeletearticle: Are you sure you want to delete this article?
app.confirmdeletearticlewarning: IMPORTANT: This will remove any blocks and components inside this article.
app.confirmdeleteblock: Are you sure you want to delete this block?
app.confirmdeleteblockwarning: IMPORTANT: This will remove any components inside this block.
app.confirmdeletecomponent: Are you sure you want to delete this component?
app.confirmdeletecomponentwarning: IMPORTANT: This will remove any formatting and information from this component.
app.confirmdeleteextension: IMPORTANT: This will remove any configuration that may have been made to properties of this extension. Are you sure you want to remove this extension?
app.editprofileinformation: You can view and modify your user information below.
app.accountislocked: This account has been locked because of too many failed login attempts. You can unlock it by clicking the 'Forgotten your password?' button.
app.passwordindicatorweak: Weak – try using numbers and capital letters
app.passwordindicatormedium: Make your password stronger with more capital letters, more numbers and special characters
app.fixerrors: Please fix the below errors before continuing.
app.assetpreviewinstruction: Select an asset to see a preview here
app.nothumbnailforimage: No thumbnail available, but click here to view the image
app.assetconfirmdelete: Are you sure you want to delete this asset?
app.assetconfirmrestore: Are you sure you want to restore this asset?
app.title: Title
app.noextensionsenabled: There are currently no extensions enabled.
app.noextensionsavailable: No extensions can be enabled at this time.
app.confirmdeleteplugin: Are you sure you want to delete %{plugin}?
app.coursesused: This plugin is used in the following courses:
app.emailinvitebody:
A new account has been set up for you at %{rootUrl}. Please click here to reset your password.

If you did not request this account, please contact %{inviter} for more information.
app.emailadminpasswordchangesubject: Your Adapt password has been changed
app.emailadminpasswordchangebody: The password for your Adapt authoring tool account has been successfully changed. If you did not request this, please contact an administrator.
app.emailforgottenpasswordbody:
We've received a request to reset the password for your Adapt authoring tool account.

If you weren't expecting this email, don't worry! You can safely ignore it. Otherwise, please click the button below.
app.tenantnotenabled: Your tenant is currently disabled. Please contact an administrator.
app.accountnotactive: Your account is not currently active. Please contact an administrator.
app.errorlogginginas: Error logging in as selected user.
app.errormenueditorbody: An error occurred during the save
app.validationfailedmessage: You need to fix the following before you can save your data:
app.errorsessionexpired: Your session has expired, click OK to log on again
app.errorassetupdate:
Something went wrong while updating the asset.
Please try again.
app.errordelete: An error occurred while deleting, please try again
app.errorsave:
Something went wrong while saving your data.
Please try again.
app.errorpreview:
Something went wrong while generating your preview.
Please contact an administrator for assistance.
app.erroraddingarticle:
Something went wrong while adding article.
Please try again.
app.erroraddingblock:
Something went wrong while adding block.
Please try again.
app.erroraddingcomponent:
Something went wrong while adding component.
Please try again.
app.errorduplication:
Something went wrong during duplication.
Please try again.
app.errorgettingschemas: An error occurred while getting schemas.
app.errorgeneratingpreview: Error generating preview, please contact an administrator.
app.errorpaste: An error occurred during paste. Please try again.
app.errorsaveasset: An error occurred doing the save
app.errorusernoaccess: Sorry, the current user doesn't have access to this course
app.errorpagenoaccess: Sorry, you don't have the correct permissions to view this page. Click the button below to go to the dashboard.
app.errorpermission: You are not permitted to do that.
app.importcoursepartialintro: The following elements could not be imported:
app.importframeworkinstruction: Select a framework zip for import. Tags will be added to the course and all new assets.
app.importassetfoldersinstruction: Enter the names of folders that contain assets. If there are multiple folders enter a comma seperated list. Automatically checks for the following folders if no value is entered: assets, images, video, audio.
app.importinvalidpackage: Encountered an unexpected file structure. Please check you have uploaded a valid export package and try again.
app.importframeworkversions:
Import framework version: %{importVersion}
Installed framework version: %{installedVersion}

If you proceed with this import then your course will use framework %{installedVersion} and should be tested.
app.coursecanbeimportedwhitedesc: All of the plugins used in this course are identical to those in this authoring tool.
app.coursecanbeimporteddesc: One or more of the plugins used in this course will be updated as part of the import process. You should test the course after the import has completed.
app.coursecannotbeimporteddesc: One or more of the plugins used in this course are not compatible with the version of the framework that is used by this authoring tool. Please remove or update these plugins and try again.
app.coursecannotbeimporteddowngradedesc: The framework version used in this course is newer than the framework version that is used by this authoring tool. You cannot import this course because the framework version cannot be downgraded.
app.plugingreeninstallkey: This plugin will be installed into the authoring tool during import.
app.plugingreenupdatekey: This plugin will be updated in the authoring tool during import.
app.pluginamberkey: The version of this plugin included in this import is either not compatible with this authoring tool, or a newer version is already installed. The imported course will use the existing version.
app.pluginredkey: This plugin is not supported in this authoring tool. You must remove or update this plugin before you can continue with the import.
app.errorfetchingdata: An error occured fetching data. Please try refreshing your page.
app.tagfetcherror: An error occured getting the tags collection. Please try refreshing your page.
app.addedDefault: Add to new courses by default?
app.errorloadconfig: Failed to load configuration settings for %{course}
app.colourLabelIntro: The colours are only applied in the authoring tool and will not affect the generated course. The settings are synced with all users in the authoring tool.
app.stopsharingwithyourself:
You cannot remove yourself from this list.

If you want to stop sharing this course with yourself, please use another user account.
app.uploadsizeerror: File size limit exceeded. Expected no more than %{max}, received %{size}.
app.cannotfindbower: Cannot find expected bower.json file in the plugin root, please check the structure of your zip file and try again.
app.unrecognisedplugin: Unrecognised plugin - a plugin should have a bower.json file.
app.incompatibleframework: This plugin is incompatible with version %{framework} of the Adapt framework.
app.versionexists: You already have this version of the plugin installed.
